title: 11 Tips to Take Your ChatGPT Prompts to the Next Level
description: Sure, anyone can use OpenAI’s chatbot. But with smart engineering, you can get way more interesting results.

title: Crypto Was Afraid to Show Its Face at SXSW 2023
description: Any mention of crypto was deliberately veiled at this year’s festival. And that strategy might catch on.

title: The Uniquely American Future of US Authoritarianism
description: The GOP-fueled far right differs from similar movements around the globe, thanks to the country’s politics, electoral system, and changing demographics.
